Description: Papyrus fragment bearing a Coptic text on one side, written along the fibres (recto). Mounted with EA 10128, 10131-4, 10137-9.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380880) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380880)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
